params.beneficiary: Who is given credit for this staked EUL
params.underlying: The underlying token to be staked upon

params.deadline: The deadline field of the permit message
params.value: The value field of the permit message

stake((address,int256)[]).notice: Modify stake of a series of underlyings. If the sum of all amounts is positive, then this amount of EUL will be transferred in from the sender's wallet. If negative, EUL will be transferred out to the sender's wallet.

stakeGift(address,address,uint256).notice: Increase stake on an underlying, and transfer this stake to a beneficiary

stakePermit((address,int256)[],uint256,u.notice: Applies a permit() signature to EUL and then applies a sequence of staking operations

documentation.text: @notice Staking operation item. Positive amount means to increase stake on this underlying, negative to decrease.

@notice Modify stake of a series of underlyings. If the sum of all amounts is positive, then this amount of EUL will be transferred in from the sender's wallet. If negative, EUL will be transferred out to the sender's wallet.
 @param ops Array of operations to perform
